functionality.name: Admin Login
functionality.description: Login feature for administrators, with password reset capabilities and restricted access for unauthorized users.

requirements.description: The system must restrict access to non-administrative users and display a notification for denied access attempts.
The system must provide a login interface for users to enter their email and password.
The system must allow users to reset their password by entering a new password and confirming it.
The system must validate the new password, ensuring it meets security criteria (e.g., length, special characters).
The system must confirm successful password changes and notify the user.

epics.description: Facilitate user login with secure authentication.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in with my email and password to access the system.

tasks.description: Design the login page UI with fields for email and password.
Create backend endpoints for user authentication and session management.

user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to ensure that unauthorized users are prevented from accessing the platform.

tasks.description: Implement role-based access control logic in the backend.

epics.description: Restrict access to authorized personnel only.

user_stories.description: As a non-administrative user, I want to know if Iâ€™m denied access to the system so that I can contact the administrator.

tasks.description: Develop a popup notification for access denial with an appropriate message.
Implement logic to check user roles and restrict access dynamically.

epics.description: Allow users to reset their passwords.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password to regain access to my account.

tasks.description: Design the UI for the password reset page.
Implement backend logic to validate the new password and update the database.

user_stories.description: As a user, I want to receive feedback if my new password does not meet security requirements.

tasks.description: Add client-side validation for password strength before submission.
Implement server-side checks for password compliance with security rules.
